test_description: Verify PostGIS ST_Contains query correctly routes user to Service Center based on geofenced polygon
preconditions: Service Center A has polygon defined in DB; Service Center B has distinct polygon; User address is inside A
test_steps: 1. Seed database with Service Center polygons; 2. Call Routing Service API with lat/long inside Polygon A; 3. Call API with lat/long inside Polygon B; 4. Call API with lat/long outside both
expected_result: Coordinates inside A return Service Center A; Inside B return B; Outside return 404/Fallback

test_description: Verify service request updates queued offline are synchronized correctly upon network restoration using Last-Write-Wins
preconditions: Technician App logged in; Network simulated disconnected
test_steps: 1. Disconnect network; 2. Technician marks job 'Resolved' locally; 3. Server-side script updates job to 'Cancelled' (conflict simulation); 4. Reconnect network; 5. Trigger Sync
expected_result: Sync manager detects conflict; Applies Last-Write-Wins policy (or user intervention logic); Final state consistent on both client and server
test_data_needs: WatermelonDB local seed; API mock for network toggling
success_criteria: Zero data loss; Data consistency achieved within 30s of reconnection

test_description: Validate end-to-end latency of technician location updates via WebSocket
test_steps: 1. Establish WSS connections; 2. Simulate technician GPS stream at 10s intervals; 3. Measure time delta between 'sent' timestamp and 'received' event on consumer client
test_data_needs: GPS trace files; k6 WebSocket script

test_description: Verify Invoice OCR worker correctly extracts fields and handles retry logic on failure
preconditions: Azure AI Document Intelligence mock available
test_steps: 1. Upload PDF invoice to Blob Storage; 2. Publish message to Service Bus; 3. Verify Worker consumes message; 4. Verify extracted JSON matches expectations
expected_result: Product Name, Date, Serial Number extracted and persisted to DB
success_criteria: Extraction accuracy > 90%; Retry mechanism triggers on 5xx errors
